name: Unity Whirld Package
summary: Learn about .WHIRLD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: A WHIRLD file can be saved and loaded in Unity after the Unity Whirld library has been installed. While some of the world features are supported in UTW files, some others may not be, including meshes and textures.
Completed WHIRLD files can be streamed by applications like Syn3h or exported to a standard web-compatible format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
